data.title: Luxury Mansion Premiere – El Martinete Villa

data.meta_site_name: Marbella Motorsports - Marbella Motorsports offers a complete motorsport solutions in southern Spain. We provide professional race car storage, transport, service, maintenance & preparation.
data.text:
Join us for an unforgettable evening at El Martinete Villa, one of Marbella’s most exclusive venues. This luxurious event offers our members a magical night filled with live performances, gourmet cuisine, and premium drinks. The evening begins at 19:00 and continues until 02:00, with an optional road trip from El Higeron starting at 15:00.

Remember, demand exceeds supply! Only members and sponsors can apply for a maximum of two free tickets. After applying, await confirmation until Monday, May 13, to find out if you have secured your spot.

This process ensures fair access to what promises to be one of the year’s most memorable events.

Everything for the evening is included—food, drinks, and entertainment. Please ensure punctuality to experience the full array of surprises planned for you.

15:0-18:30 – Road Trip from El Higeron Resturant

19:00-23:00 – Party with performance and shows at El Martinete Villa

23:00-02:00 – Afterparty with DJ and performance at El Martinete Villa

Dress code: Elegante

Apply Here to secure your spot and immerse yourself in the splendor of Marbella’s finest event.

Where classic style meets modern luxury – One of the most legendary mansions on the famous Spanish Costa del Sol. Located at the gates of Marbella, one of Europe’s favorite luxury tourist destinations.

El Martinete Villa, renowned for its beauty and exclusivity, is also available for private bookings, making it the perfect backdrop for our gathering.
